description:
A trip to Naguri Lake? Sounds like fun, especially since Aoi gets to try canoeing with her coworker. But does this outing feel a bit... unusual?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Hikari no Date Daisakusen! / Minna de White Christmas!
Hikari`s Big Date Plans! / Together for a White Christmas!
ひかりのデート大作戦! / みんなでホワイトクリスマス!
